attributes.additional_details: Ladybrook Children's centre in Warwickshire is an integral part of many familys lives. We are aware that budget cuts means that action towards children's centres must occur, but we need to keep Ladybrook open on an individual basis as a single centre as it does now. This petition is to show the government how important this centre is to many people and that we need the goverments help and compassion to keep it open and run as a single centre
